data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: If you're running Debian, or a Debian-based system, your package manager can install Moose. Using ____ method ____ advantages ____ disadvantages. The ____ is ____ you ____ not ____ be ____ the ____ edge ____ Moose, and ____ all Moose extensions ____ packaged ____ Debian. The advantages are that you get quality control, security tracking, and ease of installation with Debian's APT.
data.partBlankContent: If you're running Debian, or a Debian-based system, your package manager can install Moose. Using th__ method h__ advantages a__ disadvantages. The disadv______ is th__ you wi__ not alw___ be run____ the blee____ edge o_ Moose, and n__ all Moose extensions a__ packaged f__ Debian. The advantages are that you get quality control, security tracking, and ease of installation with Debian's APT.
data.answer: 如果您正在运行Debian或基于Debian的系统，您的软件包管理器可以安装Moose。使用这种方法有利有弊。缺点是，你不会总是运行Moose的前沿，并不是所有的Moose扩展都是为Debian打包的。使用Debian的APT，您可以获得质量控制、安全跟踪和易于安装。
